meanings.definition: The study or analysis of symptoms.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use symptomatologies to understand patients' health issues.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the symptomatologies of various illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The class on symptomatologies was surprisingly interesting.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, symptomatologies are like puzzle pieces to solve.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained symptomatologies in a clear and concise manner.

meanings.definition: The symptoms exhibited by a particular disease or condition.
meanings.sent1: The doctor analyzed the symptomatologies to diagnose the illness.
meanings.sent2: The symptomatologies of the flu include fever and cough.
meanings.sent3: The strange symptomatologies of the rare disease puzzled the medical team.
meanings.sent4: Her face showed the symptomatologies of stress and exhaustion.
meanings.sent5: The symptomatologies of the virus spread quickly through the community.
